title: PBE Signup
body: Whenever I go to this site it says something has gone hextechnically wrong. I wouldn't be saying this if I thought the servers were just down, but for the past probably 4 months whenever I've gone to the site it's done this.

replies.body: The 500 error is something we're currently looking into and would love more information on.  Grab a screenshot including your URL bar, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll take a look and reply back asap!

Alright I'll do that. Thank you for the help. In the meantime though is there any chance that you could send me a temporary PBE account? I want to help test the things that are out right now, I've been having this problem for around 4 months or more, I go on league almost every day, and was accepted into the Alpha Client before open beta, or maybe is there any other way I can get to the point of requesting for the PBE?
